column2: Americans all over are clamoring for more land and more power. We are now at a capacity to force the capitulation of the United States of Mexico and annex them into our union. Many un-American racists complain of adding Mexicans to our midst, and those odd natives they oppress, but we are above that. Manifest Destiny will greatly improve and civilize the lives of Mexicans and all others. Let the Eagle spread her wings.
